title: Philadelphia’s new brand platform positions cream cheese as kitchen staple
summary: “Really Philly Good” introduces a new brand character, Phillyboy, and represents the Kraft Heinz spread’s largest marketing investment to date.

title: Forrester TEI study: How B2C Commerce and Order Management delivered a 119% return on investment
